Req Id: 592Job Function: TaxJob Location: TaipeiAbout The BusinessDue to the rapidly changing business environment faced by multinational companies, the increase in related-party transactions, growing complexity of deals, and differing transfer pricing regulations across countries, transfer pricing has become a critical issue in tax planning for multinational companies. A company’s transfer pricing policies are closely linked to income tax, business tax, customs duties, and other taxes, directly affecting overall profitability. Without proper transfer pricing planning, companies may face excessive tax burdens and increased risks of adjustments, penalties, and double taxation.With years of experience in transfer pricing, a strong global network, deep understanding of international regulations, and a team of tax and economic professionals, Deloitte provides comprehensive transfer pricing tax consulting services to help multinational companies comply with local requirements, reduce tax burdens, and minimize the risk of double taxation.Work You'll doAssist Taiwanese businesses with investment structures, tax, and process planning related to overseas investments. Assist foreign companies in applying for various tax incentives and reducing withholding tax rates (e.g., applying tax treaties, profit margins, Article 25 of the Income Tax Act), as well as providing tax consultation for investments in Taiwan. Assist foreign companies with tax health checks for their subsidiaries/branches in Taiwan (including income tax, business tax, customs duties, and stamp duties). Provide tax consulting on investment structures and transaction processes for foreign companies investing in Taiwan. Provide tax compliance and investment structure tax analysis for cross-border mergers and acquisitions. Assist foreign and Taiwanese companies in preparing transfer pricing reports and handling transfer pricing project reviews. Assist foreign and Taiwanese companies in preparing master file submissions, country-by-country reports, and reviewing tax risks in transaction processes and investment structures. Assist foreign companies with their subsidiaries/branches in Taiwan in applying for unilateral or bilateral advance pricing agreements and reviewing profit allocation and tax risk. RequirementsA degree or higher in Accounting, Finance, Economics, or other business-related fields. Strong proficiency in both Chinese and English communication and writing, with a TOEIC score of 750 or higher preferred. Proficient in Microsoft Office: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook. Strong system thinking, communication, coordination, teamwork, sales and persuasion skills, high self-management, and high standards. Detail-oriented, patient, with excellent organizational skills. No experience required; relevant work experience is a plus.

Together, we’ll bring the power of Agentforce to organizations of all sizes and deliver amazing experiences that customers love. 業務執行就是創意產業的超級製作人。我們整合資源、分析數據、尋找渠道、激發創意、開發產品、媒合機會、甚至挖掘人才；在客戶、創意、策略、市場、消費者之間，用創意找到生意的撬動點、平衡點、爆發點。在消費者與品牌間、商業目標與解題傳播方案間、客戶期待與團隊挑戰間進行聯繫、釐清與提供解決方式 。全方位策劃與管理專案，依照專案需求進行跨領域、跨傳播管道與資源的溝通整合，讓專案得以執行實現 。傳播數位平台的串連與管理。透過消費者研究、數據分析與趨勢觀察，規劃並擬定品牌數位及社群傳播內容，為品牌獲得社群關注、內容創造、粉絲深化。進一步透過Martech實現線上行銷線下購買、社群商務或消費者體驗設計。 協助、啟發、參與團隊產出解決商業課題、具備數位創新、製造品牌與消費者對話、產生影響力的傳播解決方案。 調度奧美國際網絡資源，轉化全球區域總部的知識與情報，靈活應用於在地市場與客戶服務。我們期待您： 1. 持續對事物抱持好奇、掌握趨勢、享受生活、擁抱數位，並沉浸創意 2. 不怕挫折、堅信越挫越勇，以正面態度迎向每一天的挑戰 3. 謹慎細心、具責任感，能在步調快速的工作環境中順利完成任務 4. 擅長溝通、敢於發言，在專案進行時不吝分享想法，與本土及跨國團隊共同完成目標 5. 邏輯佳、反應快速，能有效率的解決迎面而來的問題

Company:** NXP Semiconductors Taiwan LtdJob SummaryAs a Sales Account Manager at NXP Semiconductors Taiwan Ltd, you will be responsible for driving revenue growth and market share within a defined territory or set of key accounts. You will develop and execute strategic sales plans, build strong customer relationships, and leverage NXP's comprehensive portfolio of semiconductor solutions to meet customer needs and achieve sales targets.Job Responsibilities Develop and execute comprehensive sales strategies and account plans to achieve and exceed assigned sales quotas and business objectives. Proactively identify, qualify, and secure new business opportunities within the assigned territory or key accounts. Cultivate and maintain strong, long-lasting relationships with key decision-makers, engineering teams, and purchasing departments at customer organizations. Understand customer design cycles, technical requirements, and business challenges to effectively position NXP's products and solutions. Collaborate closely with internal teams, including Field Application Engineers (FAEs), product marketing, and customer service, to provide comprehensive support and solutions to customers. Prepare and deliver compelling sales presentations, product demonstrations, and technical proposals. Negotiate contracts, pricing, and terms to ensure mutually beneficial agreements. Provide accurate sales forecasts, pipeline management, and regular reports on sales activities and market trends. Stay up-to-date with industry trends, competitive landscape, and NXP's product roadmap to effectively articulate value propositions. Represent NXP at industry events, trade shows, and customer meetings.Job Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering, Business Administration, or a related technical field. 5+ years of proven experience in sales or account management within the semiconductor industry, preferably with a focus on embedded systems, microcontrollers, or power management. Strong understanding of the electronics industry, market dynamics, and customer needs in Taiwan. Demonstrated track record of achieving and exceeding sales targets. Excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation skills in both Mandarin and English (both written and spoken). Ability to build rapport and establish trust quickly with diverse stakeholders. Proactive, self-motivated, and results-oriented with a strong sense of ownership. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. Proficiency in CRM software (e.g., Salesforce) and Microsoft Office Suite. Ability to travel frequently within Taiwan and occasionally internationally as required.More information about NXP in Greater China...
